text.headline: Management Trainee
text.detail: Assited US private clients in making key financial decisions by crafting Asset Summary Reports, reviewing third-party reports and analyzing market trends

text.headline: Data Analyst Intern
text.detail: Developed a student dropout prediction app using Python and Streamlit to aid in early intervention strategies for at-risk students and designed analytical dashboards on PowerBI.

text.headline: Financial Modeling Intern
text.detail: Gained foundation knowledge in Project Finance and designed a financial model in Excel
